AM5¶

Introduction¶

Successor of AM4, uses the DDR5 memory standard. Closely related to sTR5.

Key Facts & Figures¶

Microarchitecture:

Ryzen

Process nodes:

TSMC 5nm or 3nm

Core counts:

6, 8, 12 or 16 (inc. SMT)

Native FSB:

100 MHz

Chipsets:

AMD B650, X670, X850 and X870

Benching it¶

TBA

Overclocking-Wiki
